Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm

Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsmAssembledRead  
    AsmAssembledReadBuilder  
    AsmContig  
    AsmContigBuilder  
    AsmContigDataStore  
    AsmContigVisitor
    AsmContigVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single contig in an ASM file.
    AsmContigVisitor.VariantRecord
    VariantRecord is an alternative sequence for a specific region in a contig.
    AsmParser
    AsmParser is an interface that will parse a Celera Assembler ASM formatted structures and call the appropriate visit methods on the given AsmVisitor.
    AsmScaffoldVisitor
    AsmScaffoldVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single scaffold in an ASM file that contains more than one contig.
    AsmUnitig
    A Unitig is a special kind of contig whose length is "as long as possible" until the assembler found a contradiction.
    AsmUnitigBuilder  
    AsmUnitigDataStore  
    AsmUnitigVisitor
    AsmUnitigVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single unitig in an ASM file.
    AsmVisitor
    AsmVisitor is a visitor implementation to traverse a Celera Assembler .ASM file.
    AsmVisitor.AsmVisitorCallback
    AsmVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism to allow the AsmVisitor instances to communicate with the parser that is parsing the ASM file.
    AsmVisitor.AsmVisitorCallback.AsmVisitorMemento
    AsmVisitorMemento is a marker interface that AsmFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its ASM file in order to revisit portions of the ASM file.
    AsmVisitor.MatePairEvidence  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAsmContigBuilder
    AbstractAsmContigBuilder is a AsmContigVisitor that will populate an AsmContigBuilder instance when its visit methods are called.
    AbstractAsmUnitigBuilder
    AbstractAsmUnitigBuilder is a AsmUnitigVisitor that will populate an AsmUnitigBuilder instance when its visit methods are called.
    AsmFileContigDataStoreBuilder  
    AsmFileParser
    AsmFileParser is a class that can parse Celera Assembler files.
    AsmFileUnitigDataStoreBuilder  
    AsmUtil
    AsmUtil is a utility class for working with Celera Assembler ASM encoded data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AsmVisitor.LinkOrientation
    LinkOrientation represents the the relative orientation of the two unitigs or the two contigs being linked.
    AsmVisitor.MateStatus
    MateStatus indicates the relative positioning of the mate of this read in the assembly.
    AsmVisitor.OverlapStatus
    OverlapStatus describes the pair-wise alignment of contigs/unitigs induced by the mate pairs in this link.
    AsmVisitor.OverlapType
    OverlapType describes the pair-wise alignment of contigs/unitigs induced by the mate pairs in this link.
    AsmVisitor.UnitigLayoutType
    UnitigLayoutType describes how the assembler decided to place this unitig in the scaffold.
    AsmVisitor.UnitigStatus
    UnitigStatus represents the unitig's disposition after scaffold construction.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm Description

Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
See Also:
Celera Assembler paper : Science 24 March 2000: 287 (5461), 2196-2204. [DOI:10.1126/science.287.5461.2196]
